```{r load_packages, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r load_data}
coffee_reviews <- read_csv("data/cleaned_coffee.csv")

```


```{r tests, fig.height=10}

ggplot(coffee_reviews,
       aes(y = country_of_origin,
           fill = country_of_origin)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```
